description:
On the planet Daros, the Autobots aid desperate prisoners in overthrowing the Decepticons and the planet`s decadent ruling class. But that`s not all—the key to defeating Scorponok is also hidden on this world!
Source: TFWiki.net

titles.title: Mega Zarak no Jakuten o Abake!!
メガザラックの弱点をあばけ!!
